title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook the pancetta or bacon in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and immediately mix with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add the cooked pancetta and stir quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, turmeric, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until lightly charred.
Melt butter in a pan, then add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and stir until the sauce thickens.
Add grilled chicken pieces to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy avocado smashed on toasted sourdough, topped with seeds.
instructions: Toast the sourdough slices.
Scoop the avocado into a bowl and mash with lemon, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toasted bread.
Sprinkle seeds on top and serve immediately.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: Slow-cooked beef in red wine with mushrooms and pearl onions.
instructions: Sear beef chunks in a hot pan until browned.
Add garlic, tomato paste, and vegetables; cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in red wine and beef broth.
